Name: Open Space 2D
About the game: Welcome to Open Space, the RPG where you fly planet to planet fighting space pirates and building up your ship to fight the Pirate Mothership. Move using the arrow keys, interact using spacebar and bring up menus using O on the numpad or hitting ESC. If you like old school RPGs, and you like space, then you are going to like this game. ARM is Armor, BAT is battery, and REA is your nuclear reactor. Learn as you go and have fun completing runs! Random events change the game experience every time you play!
Meta Title: Open Space 2D: Jul 6, 2018, Jordan Rott and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Open Space 2D? Check out the release date (Jul 6, 2018), developer insights from Jordan Rott, and a complete game summary.
